subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Tim Couch, the No. 1 pick in the 1999 N.F.L. draft, had doping regimens that called for steroids, according to documents obtained by Yahoo.com.
snippet: Quarterback Tim Couch, the No. 1 pick in the 1999 N.F.L. draft, had doping regimens that called for steroids, according to documents obtained by Yahoo.com.
